column4: E: Unable to fetch some archives, maybe run apt-get update or try with --fix-missing?

keeps saying 97% [Waiting for headers] [Waiting for headers]                        62B/s 0s
I tried to google the error and came to some forums etc but that wouldn't help me out much either
thats what i was trying to say
i think it has something to do with the multiverse mirrors
try another mirror? certain sources have problems from time to time.
it may also be a proxy issue
try taking out the 'us' at the start of the path on every repo in sources.list
and? did you update? did it work?
gcc is not installed by default
is this before you removed the us.*, or did you put it back?
